A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It crushes my soul to rate Star Wars low but really way too much to overlook or forgive just to get myself to say it is good ... it is ok at best ... yes I had fun but it comes across as a comedy and not a fun sci fi action adventure ... everyone has the right to their opinion but I just felt weird watching this and I usually feel awesome watching Star Wars ... I will see it one more time to be fair to it
